00004  * @brief Charset class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used as a reference for common charsets, used mostly for encryption.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Charset

00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>

00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Charset {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Alphanumeric characters.
00020      */
00021     protected static $alphaNum = '0123456789abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief ASCII printable characters.
00025      * 
00026      * Characters 33 - 126. Does not include space.
00027      */
00028     protected static $printable = '!"#$%&\'()*+,-./0123456789:;<=>?@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ[\]^_`abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz{|}~';
00029     
00030     /**
00031      * @brief Hexadecimal characters.
00032      */
00033     protected static $hex = '0123456789abcdef';
00034     
00035     /**
00036      * @brief Get array of alphanumeric characters.
00037      * 
00038      * @return string Alphanumeric characters.
00039      */
00040     public static function getAlphaNum() { return self::$alphaNum; }
00041     
00042     /**
00043      * @brief Get array of printable characters.
00044      * 
00045      * Characters 33 - 126. Does not include space.
00046      * 
00047      * @return string Printable characters.
00048      */
00049     public static function getPrintable() { return self::$printable; }
00050     
00051     /**
00052      * @brief Get array of hexadecimal characters.
00053      * 
00054      * @return string Hexadecimal characters.
00055      */
00056     public static function getHex() { return self::$hex; }
00057 }
